Package src.Database

Class UserDatabase

java.lang.Object
src.Database.UserDatabase
public class UserDatabase extends Object
Class that handles the database inputs that relates to the user database

    • getConnection

      public Connection getConnection()

    • isEmailRegistered

      public boolean isEmailRegistered(String email) throws SQLException
      Checks if the user is already registered in the database. Returns true if user is already registered.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • validateLogin

      public boolean validateLogin(String email, String password)
      Validates login credentials for a given email and password combination.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user trying to log in.
      password - the password of the user trying to log in.
      Returns:
      true if the login credentials are valid, false otherwise. The method queries the database to count the number of rows that match the email and password, and returns true if the count is 1, meaning there is a match. If there is an error with the SQL query, it prints the stack trace and returns false.

    • createUser

      public boolean createUser(String email, int age, String sex, String password) throws SQLException
      Creates a new user with the given email, first name, last name, age, sex, and password in the database. Also creates a corresponding row in the user_data table. Returns true if the operation was successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getUserId

      public int getUserId(String email)
      Retrieves the user ID of a given email address from the "users" table in the database.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user.
      Returns:
      The user ID associated with the given email address. Returns -1 if the email address is not found.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs while executing the SQL query.

    • addWeight

      public boolean addWeight(int userId, double weight) throws SQLException
      Adds current weight to a user_id in the database. If successful, returns true.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • addBmr

      public boolean addBmr(int userId, int bmr) throws SQLException
      Updates the BMR (Basal Metabolic Rate) value of a given user in the user_data table of the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user whose BMR needs to be updated
      bmr - the new BMR value to be set for the user
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs or this method is called on a closed connection

    • addTdee

      public boolean addTdee(int userId, int tdee) throws SQLException
      Updates the tdee (Total Daily Energy Expenditure) value of a given user in the user_data table of the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user whose BMR needs to be updated
      tdee - the new BMR value to be set for the user
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs or this method is called on a closed connection
